workflow.name: 90-SAPHanaSR
workflow.longdesc:
The SAPHanaSR HAWK wizard is capable to configure all needed resources, master slave and clone definitions as well as constraints.
As SAPHanaSR configurations are intended to be very standardized the wizard asks only three needed parameters: SID, InstanceNumber and ip address.
